SELECT hcu.id id, hcu.coupon_user_code coupon_user_code, hct.order_id order_id, CASE hct.attribute WHEN 0 THEN '无主单' WHEN 1 THEN '有主单' WHEN 2 THEN '线下员工' WHEN 3 THEN '线上员工' ELSE '' END AS attribute, hcc.coupon_code coupon_code, CASE WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 1 THEN '体验金' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 2 THEN '加息券' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 3 THEN '代金券' ELSE '加息券' END coupon_type,
CASE hcc.coupon_type WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.coupon_quota, 2), '元' ) WHEN 3 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.coupon_quota, 2), '元' ) ELSE CONCAT(hcc.coupon_quota, '%') END AS coupon_quota,
hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, hbt1.account account, hbt.client AS operating_deck, CONCAT(hb.borrow_apr, '%') borrow_apr, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, FROM_UNIXTIME( hct.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) order_date, hcr.received_flg received_flg, CASE WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 0 THEN '项目期限不限' WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 1 THEN CONCAT( '等于', hcc.project_expiration_length, '月' ) WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 2 THEN CONCAT( hcc.project_expiration_length_min, '月~', hcc.project_expiration_length_max, '月' ) WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 3 THEN CONCAT( '大于等于', hcc.project_expiration_length, '月' ) WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 4 THEN CONCAT( '小于等于', hcc.project_expiration_length, '月' ) ELSE '项目期限不限' END project_expiration_type, hcc.coupon_system AS coupon_system, hcc.project_type AS project_type,
FROM_UNIXTIME( hcu.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) add_time FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=1 AND hbt.user_id = #{userId} INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow hb ON hbt.borrow_nid = hb.borrow_nid
LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender hbt1 ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hbt1.nid
GROUP BY hct.order_id ORDER BY hbt.order_date DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, hbt.nid nid, hcu.coupon_user_code coupon_user_code, CASE WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 1 THEN '体验金' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 2 THEN '加息券' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 3 THEN '代金券' ELSE '加息券' END coupon_type, CONCAT(hb.borrow_apr, '%') borrow_apr, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, IFNULL(hbten.account,'0.00') account, CONCAT('第',hcr.recover_period, '期') recover_period, CASE hcc.coupon_type WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.coupon_quota, 2), '元' ) WHEN 3 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.coupon_quota, 2), '元' ) ELSE CONCAT(hcc.coupon_quota, '%') END AS coupon_quota, hcr.recover_account recover_interest, hcr.transfer_id transfer_id, hcr.received_flg received_flg, FROM_UNIXTIME( hbt.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) add_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) recover_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.recover_yestime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) recover_yestime FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id AND hcu.user_id = #{userId} INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=1 INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender hbten ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hbten.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow hb ON hbt.borrow_nid=hb.borrow_nid ORDER BY recover_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}
